summary: After months of meticulous planning, investigators finally move in to catch AlphaBay’s mastermind red-handed. Then the case takes a tragic turn.
title: The Hunt for the Dark Web’s Biggest Kingpin, Part 5: Takedown
detailed_content: CONTENT WARNING: This story includes references to suicide. If you need help, call the Suicide and Crisis Lifeline for your region.
tags: THE RISE AND FALL OF ALPHABAY
author: BY ANDY GREENBERG
